DOC.brief_title: Development Questionnaire Evaluate Patient Expectations Breast Reconstruction Women With Breast Cancer Other Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Develop validate questionnaire evaluate preoperative expectation breast reconstruction woman breast cancer condition . - Determine variation expectation related patient characteristic . - Develop educational module help patient understand realistic outcome . - Identify patient group risk dissatisfaction . OUTLINE : This 3-part study . - Part 1 ( first 80 patient ) : Both preoperative postoperative patient ( 50 patient total ) undergo interview research study assistant expectation breast reconstructive surgery . Some patient also complete pilot version questionnaire expectation breast reconstructive surgery ( 30 patient total ) . - Part 2 ( next 200 patient ) : Preoperative patient complete questionnaire ( preliminary questionnaire develop part 1 MSKCC BREAST-Q [ Reconstruction Module ] ) expectation breast reconstructive surgery patient education breast reconstructive surgery . Some patient ( 100 patient ) also complete Brief Cope address emotional expression emotional processing style cop , Impact Events Scale , Life Orientation Test-Revised ( LOT-R ) questionnaires . - Part 3 ( final 200 patient ) : Preoperative patient complete questionnaire ( final questionnaire develop part 2 ) expectation breast reconstructive surgery patient education breast reconstruction surgery . Patients also complete Breast Reconstruction Outcomes Questionnaire ( MSKCC BREAST-Q ) surgery ( patient education ) surgery measure patient satisfaction quality life . A small group patient complete Body Image Scale ( BIS ) LOT-R address body image , sexuality , personal well-being , lifestyle .
